would it be very practical to run utorre: i have 2 monitors right now and I can't figure out how to split between them :(
is there any way i can associate torrents with utorrent AND have it open with wine?
it yped pico /usr/bin/TORRENT, should I do the other?
You should use Sudo, and make sure you have at least some editor editing the file
then press control+x and choose to save it
then type in "sudo chmod+x /usr/bin/TORRENT", and then right click on a torrent file, choose properties, find "open with", choose an "other" option, and type in manually the command "TORRENT".
copy and paste the command.  It uses the ````` key next to the `, above the tab.
make the text file read:  "/usr/bin/wine /home/ssb/.wine/drive_c/Program\ files/utorrent.exe"  Notice the lack of slash after wine.
